languages.text: "До сих пор не верю, что мы спаслись! В Темном городе я часто молилась Великому, и теперь нужна куча тронов, чтобы исполнить обещанное Ему. Но я не жалею!"
"I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"
languages.original_text: "До сих пор не верю, что мы спаслись! В Темном городе я часто молилась Великому, и теперь нужна куча тронов, чтобы исполнить обещанное Ему. Но я не жалею!"

traits.locale_text: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"
"I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"
"I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"
"I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

languages.text: “我还是不敢相信，我们居然活了下来！在黑暗之城，我时常向至高无上的神皇祈祷，现在我恐怕要花一大笔王座币来履行我承诺过的交易了，但我一点都不后悔！”
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

traits.locale_text: “我还是不敢相信，我们居然活了下来！在黑暗之城，我时常向至高无上的神皇祈祷，现在我恐怕要花一大笔王座币来履行我承诺过的交易了，但我一点都不后悔！”

languages.text: « Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire qu'on s'en soit sortis vivants ! J'ai beaucoup prié l'Exalté, quand nous étions dans la Cité Crépusculaire, et je vais devoir amasser un sacré paquet de trônes pour tenir ma part du marché, mais je ne regrette rien ! »
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire qu'on s'en soit sortis vivants ! J'ai beaucoup prié l'Exalté, quand nous étions dans la Cité Crépusculaire, et je vais devoir amasser un sacré paquet de trônes pour tenir ma part du marché, mais je ne regrette rien ! »

languages.text: «¡Todavía no puedo creer que nos hayamos salvado! En la Ciudad Siniestra, rezaba constantemente al Exaltado. Ahora necesitaré una montaña de tronos para cumplir mi parte del trato, ¡pero no me arrepiento!».
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Todavía no puedo creer que nos hayamos salvado! En la Ciudad Siniestra, rezaba constantemente al Exaltado. Ahora necesitaré una montaña de tronos para cumplir mi parte del trato, ¡pero no me arrepiento!».

languages.text: 「助かったなんて、まだ信じられないよ！仄暗き都ではたびたびエグザルテッド・ワンに祈ったんだ、今度はアタシが責任を果たせるよう権力をいただかないとね。未練はないよ！」
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

traits.locale_text: 「助かったなんて、まだ信じられないよ！仄暗き都ではたびたびエグザルテッド・ワンに祈ったんだ、今度はアタシが責任を果たせるよう権力をいただかないとね。未練はないよ！」

languages.text: "Ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass wir gerettet wurden! In der Dunklen Stadt habe ich oft zum Erhabenen gebetet, und nun benötige ich viele Thronmünzen, um meinen Teil der Abmachung einzuhalten. Doch ich bereue nichts!"
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass wir gerettet wurden! In der Dunklen Stadt habe ich oft zum Erhabenen gebetet, und nun benötige ich viele Thronmünzen, um meinen Teil der Abmachung einzuhalten. Doch ich bereue nichts!"

languages.original_text: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

languages.text: "Kurtarıldığımıza hâlâ inanamıyorum! Kara Şehir'de hep Görkemli'ye dualar ederdim. Şimdi kendi sözümü yerine getirebilmek için bolca gelte ihtiyacım olacak, yine de pişman değilim!"
languages.original_text: "I still can't believe we've been saved! In the Dark City, I often prayed to the Exalted One, and now I'm going to need a lot of thrones to hold up my end of the bargain, but I have no regrets!"

traits.locale_text: "Kurtarıldığımıza hâlâ inanamıyorum! Kara Şehir'de hep Görkemli'ye dualar ederdim. Şimdi kendi sözümü yerine getirebilmek için bolca gelte ihtiyacım olacak ama pişman değilim!"
